subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: With two fractures in his left ankle, Brett Favre’s N.F.L.-record streak of 291 consecutive games — 315 including the postseason — is in jeopardy.
snippet: With two fractures in his left ankle, Brett Favre’s N.F.L.-record streak of 291 consecutive games — 315 including the postseason — is in jeopardy.
